Vue Selectize

Vanila Vue.js component that mimics Selectize behaviour (no need jquery dependency)

Get Started â†’

# Getting Started

Installation

npm install @isneezy/vue-selectize --save
# OR
yarn add selectize @isneezy/vue-selectize
